          <title>
            <string language="en">Atomic radii of the first 36 elements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atomradien der ersten 6 Elemente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayons atomiques des 36 premiers éléments</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the atomic radii (in nanometres) of the first 36 elements in the periodic table.</string>
